items.summary: Implement a backend bootstrap flow that auto-creates the main admin user when the first Internet Identity login occurs and there is no existing user record for that Principal. This must prevent the circular dependency where only an Admin can access the Users module but the Admin does not exist yet.

Update the frontend authentication/profile gating so that, after Internet Identity login, the app attempts the backend main-admin bootstrap automatically and does not show the "Create Profile" screen for the main admin bootstrap case.

Preserve existing behavior for non-admin users: users other than the main admin must still be created by an Admin from the Users module; do not introduce a general self-signup / self-profile-creation bypass.
